```{python}
import time
time.sleep(second)
```

# 并行线程
```{python}
import threading
def test():
    for i in range(10):
        print(i)
t1 = threading.Thread(target=test)
t2 = threading.Thread(target=test)
t3 = threading.Thread(target=test)
t4 = threading.Thread(target=test)
t1.start()
t2.start()
t3.start()
t4.start()

```
